subs.text: August 15

The quality of @amazonIN's prime delivery has significantly degraded in recent times. Two orders in two days that were out of delivery were marked as "attempted delivery" when the agents didn't even arrive at our houses. The delivery agency's found a loophole they are milking.

subs.text: August 5

I find it surprising that iTunes remain the only good store to buy digital music even today. There has to be some reason that all the big players have exited the space and have gone the streaming route. Is it the competition? Or the overall logistics of selling digital music?

subs.text: August 1

We sometimes write sentences that don‚Äôt need to exist. Hidden in a paragraph, we might not notice. Standing on their own, we notice. Delete any sentence not worthy of its own line. Source: Writing one sentence per line | Derek Sivers ‚Üí [link]
subs.rawText:
